title: Would the world stop without clocks?
description: Rob and Neil are in a hurry to discuss our concept of time and teach you new words

vocabItems.definition: run out of timeuse it all uppenduluma stick with a weight on the end that swings regularly from side to side
the round part of a clock (but more generally, it refers to a round instrument that shows you the amount of something, for example, heat, pressure or speed)
mechanicalit has to do with machinespreciseaccurate and exact
limiting what somebody can do in a way that is damaging. It's also a jacket with long arms that are tied behind a person to stop them from behaving violently
